title: VÃ­deo. Vanessa Martins voa sobre o Rio de Janeiro de helicÃ³ptero
text:
Vanessa Martins viajou para o Brasil no inÃ­cio do ano e tem partilhado os momentos que viveu na regiÃ£o de SÃ£o Paulo e Rio de Janeiro.
Esta quinta-feira, 23 de janeiro, a atriz partilhou um vÃ­deo seu a sobrevoar o Rio para poder ver o Cristo Redentor.
No vÃ­deo, Vanessa Martins escreveu que "no dia em que decidiu ir ver o Cristo de helicÃ³ptero estava nublado... mas ele apareceu para me ver. Que experiÃªncia especial".
JÃ¡ na legenda da publicaÃ§Ã£o, a atriz relatou que quando aterrou, conheceu a modelo Alessandra AmbrÃ³sio - que ia fazer o mesmo passeio - e que tirou uma foto com ela.
Clique na galeria e veja a experiÃªncia partilhada por Vanessa Martins.
Leia TambÃ©m: "NÃ£o interessa de onde vens, interessa onde estÃ¡s"

author: RedacciÃ³n El PaÃ­s
title: Paloma Valencia por postulaciÃ³n de Petro para Nobel de Paz: "A Hitler tambiÃ©n lo nominaron"
text: Colombia Paloma Valencia por postulaciÃ³n de Petro para Nobel de Paz: â€œA Hitler tambiÃ©n lo nominaronâ€ La senadora del Centro DemocrÃ¡tico expresÃ³ de manera controversial su desacuerdo con la postulaciÃ³n del Jefe de Estado colombiano por parte del diputado noruego Rasmus Hansson. [Por: RedacciÃ³n El PaÃ­s](/autor/redaccion-el-pais/) Este jueves 1 de febrero el nombre del presidente Gustavo Petro ha vuelto a ser tendencia una vez mÃ¡s [por la presunta noticia de la supuesta peticiÃ³n de renuncia protocolaria hacia todos sus ministros,](https://www.elpais.com.co/politica/lo-ultimo-el-presidente-gustavo-petro-habria-pedido-la-renuncia-protocolaria-a-todo-su-gabinete-esto-se-sabe-0100.html) la cual hasta el momento MarÃ­a Paula Fonseca, jefe de prensa de la Presidencia, desmintiÃ³ dicha versiÃ³n. Asimismo, [el primer mandatario estÃ¡ en la lengua de varias personas alrededor del mundo debido a su postulaciÃ³n para obtener el premio Nobel de Paz, ](https://www.elpais.com.co/colombia/que-posibilidades-hay-de-que-el-presidente-petro-gane-el-nobel-de-paz-0141.html)por parte del diputado noruego Rasmus Hansson. El parlamentario europeo justificÃ³ la elecciÃ³n de Petro por su trabajo por la construcciÃ³n del proyecto de la â€˜Paz Totalâ€™, que para Ã©l es una â€œinspiraciÃ³nâ€ hacia el mundo. Sin embargo, algunos lÃ­deres polÃ­ticos colombianos no estÃ¡n de acuerdo con dicha decisiÃ³n, ya que uno de los opositores a esta postulaciÃ³n es la senadora uribista Paloma Valencia, quien a travÃ©s de su cuenta de X (antiguo Twitter) expresÃ³ su desacuerdo de manera controversial comparando la distinciÃ³n con las de tres dictadores histÃ³ricos acusados por cometer crÃ­menes de lesa humanidad. â€œHitler, Mussolini y Stalin fueron nominados al premio Nobel de pazâ€, escribiÃ³ Paloma Valencia en su perfil de dicha red social. Hitler, Mussolini y Stalin fueron nominados al premio Nobel de paz.â€” Paloma Valencia L (@PalomaValenciaL) [February 1, 2024] Asimismo, [ otra lideresa quien se sumÃ³ al desacuerdo de Valencia con la postulaciÃ³n del presidente de Colombia hacia el Nobel de Paz fue su colega y compaÃ±era MarÃ­a Fernanda Cabal, tambiÃ©n senadora del Centro DemocrÃ¡tico.](https://www.elpais.com.co/colombia/ingrid-betancourt-reacciona-tras-nominacion-de-petro-a-premio-nobel-de-paz-0132.html) Cabal manifestÃ³ su inconformidad poniendo en debate las cifras de masacres y asesinatos de lÃ­deres sociales que han ocurrido desde que Petro asumiÃ³ el poder el 7 de agosto del 2022 y las violaciones al cese al fuego bilateral por parte de la guerrilla del ELN. â€œDesde el 7 de agosto de 2022 van 137 masacres con 465 muertes. Desde su elecciÃ³n, 262 asesinatos de lÃ­deres sociales. En 6 meses de negociaciÃ³n con el ELN, los terroristas ejecutaron: 35 secuestros y 43 homicidios. Â¿Nobel de paz?â€, asegurÃ³ Cabal en su cuenta de X. Sobre esta nominaciÃ³n a Petro:â€” MarÃ­a Fernanda Cabal (@MariaFdaCabal) - Desde el 7 de agosto de 2022 van 137 masacres con 465 muertes. - Desde su elecciÃ³n 262 asesinatos de lÃ­deres sociales. En 6 meses de negociaciÃ³n con el ELN, los terroristas ejecutaron: 35 secuestros y 43 homicidios. Â¿Nobel de paz? [pic.twitter.com/y5N8EKfE0D] [February 1, 2024] Por otra parte, en cuanto a la comparaciÃ³n de Paloma Valencia, el portal web de National Geographic asegura que durante la historia de los galardones del Nobel sÃ­ han sido postulados personajes como Adolf Hitler y Benito Mussolini, Josef Stalin Sin embargo, cabe resaltar que el ComitÃ© Nobel recibe nominaciones de todo tipo, ya que las â€œÃºnicas condiciones son que las propuestas sean enviadas antes de la fecha lÃ­mite del 31 de enero, y que provengan de una de las miles de personas con derecho a hacerlo, como parlamentarios y ministros de todos los paÃ­ses, exlaureados, ciertos profesores de universidad, o miembros actuales o pasados del ComitÃ© Nobelâ€, seÃ±alÃ³ el portal mencionado. Por Ãºltimo, la academia recibe todas estas postulaciones como las del presidente Gustavo Petro, pero primero hace un estudio de las mismas, ya que cualquier nombre no significa que va a ganar el Premio Nobel a la Paz.

author: Margot Desmas
title: Neige et verglas dans les Alpes : les vacanciers appelÃ©s Ã  la prudence sur les routes de montagne
text:
Les automobilistes sont appelÃ©s Ã  la prudence sur les routes des stations de montagne ces samedi et dimanche, alors que des chutes de neige sont annoncÃ©es en altitude. Des plaques de verglas risquent de rendre les conditions de circulation difficiles.
La neige est de retour pour la fin des vacances de NoÃ«l. De nouvelles prÃ©cipitations neigeuses sont annoncÃ©es sur les Alpes du Nord ces samedi 4 et dimanche 5 janvier. Alors que [de nombreux automobilistes](/auvergne-rhone-alpes/savoie/week-end-classe-rouge-en-savoie-a-quoi-s-attendre-sur-les-routes-ce-samedi-4-et-dimanche-5-janvier-3085150.html) sont attendus sur les routes pour rejoindre ou quitter les stations de sports d'hiver, la prÃ©fÃ¨te de l'IsÃ¨re "appelle chacun Ã  la plus grande vigilance".
DÃ¨s vendredi 3 janvier, "des brouillards givrants" sont attendus, "particuliÃ¨rement sur les pentes des prÃ©-Alpes", prÃ©vient la prÃ©fecture dans un communiquÃ©. De premiers flocons sont tombÃ©s en faible quantitÃ© dans la nuit et jusque dans la matinÃ©e de vendredi "dÃ¨s 400/500 m", selon le dernier bulletin de MÃ©tÃ©o-France.
Ainsi, les routes seront "parfois glissantes, par regel des sols humidifiÃ©s la veille", prÃ©vient l'institut de prÃ©visions. Cet Ã©pisode de neige et de pluie Ã  plus basse altitude devrait se poursuivre dans les prochains jours.
Les perturbations vont se succÃ©der jusquâ€™Ã  la fin du week-end avec de la pluie, de la neige sur les massifs et du vent.
â€” MÃ©tÃ©o-France (@meteofrance)
Les tempÃ©ratures, dâ€™abord en baisse et bien hivernales, vont remonter durant le week-end.
ðŸ‘‡[https://t.co/PfiqyYgJ3t][January 2, 2025]
Verglas sur les routes, risque d'avalanche en montagne
"Durant tout le week-end, des chutes de neige sont attendues en montagne, et pourront devenir significatives dÃ¨s 2 400 mÃ¨tres dâ€™altitude", dÃ©taille la prÃ©fecture. Des prÃ©cipitations qui pourront "rendre les conditions de circulation difficiles, avec des plaques de verglas sur les routes."
Face Ã  ces conditions dÃ©licates, la prÃ©fÃ¨te de l'IsÃ¨re Catherine SÃ©guin appelle les automobilistes Ã  anticiper leurs dÃ©placements, adapter leur vitesse ou encore augmenter les distances de sÃ©curitÃ©. Il est Ã©galement rappelÃ© que les Ã©quipements hivernaux - pneus neige, chaÃ®nes ou chaussettes Ã  neige - sont [obligatoires sur les routes de montagne](/auvergne-rhone-alpes/savoie/chambery/pneus-neige-ou-chaines-obligatoires-sanctions-zones-concernees-tout-ce-qu-il-faut-savoir-avant-le-1er-novembre-3052009.html).
L'IsÃ¨re, la Savoie et la Haute-Savoie sont par ailleurs placÃ©s dÃ¨s ce vendredi en vigilance jaune par MÃ©tÃ©o-France pour risque d'avalanche. Le risque est fort (4/5) dans les massifs savoyards du Beaufortain, de la Maurienne, de la Haute-Tarentaise et de la Vanoise. Ce mÃªme risque est marquÃ© dans tous les massifs de l'IsÃ¨re (Chartreuse, Belledonne, Grandes-Rousses, Oisans, Vercors), en Haute-Maurienne et dans le Mont-Blanc.

author: Matt Z Community
title: Trump is done.
text: Yeah, I no longer fear November.* We are going to win in a landslide. Look at this shit. ALL of it: https://www.dailykos.com/stories/2024/1/25/2219448/-Republicans-are-threatening-to-purge-anyone-who-isn-t-MAGA https://www.dailykos.com/stories/2024/1/25/2219478/-McConnell-considers-killing-major-immigration-deal-to-help-Trump https://www.dailykos.com/stories/2024/1/25/2219511/-The-RNC-says-F-you-democracy-We-pick-Trump The first link is the actual reason Trump just lost the election. McConnell caving to him is the other. If McConnell were the wily political genius he is often billed as, he would fight this. Because he's capitulating instead, Trump is done. Let me summarize what has happened in the past two days since Trump's poor showing in New Hampshire and Nikki Haley doing better than expected. Trump put out a statement that anyone who sends Haley money or votes for her from this point forward is out of the MAGA movement. And that the Republican Party is now MAGA. Let me tell you what the Republican Party actually is. The Republican Party is the party of "You can't tell me what to do." Politicians are supposed to answer to their voters, not the other way around. Voters don't like being threatened. Republicans in particular detest it. Trump was VERY careful in 2016 and 2020 NOT to do this which is why so many skeptics held their nose and voted for him anyways. They see that quote? They're gone. Half, (maybe more) will vote for Biden out of pure spite. "You can't tell me what to do!" Biden, being as smart at politics as he is, is gonna jump on this and try to coax these people over to him. It won't be hard. Our job in November has ceased being merely winning against Trump. It's beating him and the other Republicans so badly we crush MAGA into the ground. Winning back Congress in a landslide and expanding our Senate majority. The latter sounds impossible on paper. Our Senate map is brutal. Until this. I predict we keep ALL our seats but West Virginia and possibly gain Florida, Texas, and Missouri. And if I were Joe Manchin, I would rethink retiring. As unpopular as he currently is in his state, he could actually win in this climate even if Trump carries West Virginia. Everything was already aligning for us. Dobbs, January 6, the criminal trials. People feeling better about the economy, and Trump's dementia finally being highlighted. The thing is even with all that, the election still would have been close. Because Trump just threatened voters and told people who refuse to be told what to do, what to do, we are looking at a landslide. If more things like this keep happening, (and they might) we could be looking at a permanent political realignment. God what an unforced error by Trump. On-brand for that idiot but for once I'm not complaining. UPDATE: People have been asking me what Iâ€™ve been smoking. Itâ€™s called hopium. Itâ€™s the good shit. UPDATE 2: Letâ€™s get something straight. This is my prediction. I could be wrong. People making political predictions have a knack for getting things wrong. Some people below are saying predicting a good outcome is counterproductive. I donâ€™t agree. And I wonder why some people find it upsetting. I think we will crush them because I believe in you guys. I donâ€™t think there is anything wrong with that. UPDATE 3 Confidence and complacency are not the same things. I have the former and am rejecting the latter. FINAL UPDATE *I do want to address people who are NOT confident and see November through the lens of pure terror. Iâ€™m with you. I AM scared to death deep down. There has been a knot in my stomach ever since election night 2016, and though itâ€™s lessened with Biden in office, itâ€™s never gone away. Itâ€™s flaring up pretty heavily right now and I AM scared and take the threat deadly seriously. Hereâ€™s the thing. Iâ€™m not the only person with that knot. Neither are you. What this country went through was a trauma and the idea of going back to that fills most people with pure dread. But the knot? That isnâ€™t going away. And the knot is why weâ€™ll win. The knot is why nobody on our side will be dumb enough to throw away their vote on a third party candidate and why the Biden Republicans and young folks will come home. That knot is out greatest strength and weapon and we should NEVER ignore it. We should listen to it. Itâ€™s telling us HOW to win. We must take its advice. Weâ€™ll win because it matters to us, literally life and death. The other side does not actually have the stakes we do. They just wanna PWN the libtards. We want to save America and our entire way of life. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™ll win and theyâ€™ll lose. Check out my free online comic book Gilda And Meek And The Un-Iverse! gildaandmeekandtheuniverse.blogspot.com/â€¦ Costs nothing but time well spent. I however do not offer time refunds if you think it sucks.
